DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective show multiple transportable carbohydrate ingestion effective improve endurance performance compare single transportable carbohydrate ingestion .
DOC.brief_title: Glucose : Fructose Versus Glucose Carbohydrate Ingestion Endurance Performance
DOC.criteria: Males age 18 60 year A history competitive triathlon performance ( ≥ 2 year ) Participation least four competitive triathlon event within past 2 year Be regular training triathlon event A personal best time standard ½ Ironman race ( 1.9 km swim , 90 km cycle , 21.1 km run ) last year either : ≤ 6 h 00 min , men age 1840 year ≤6 h 05 min men age 4050 year ≤6 h 20 min men age 5060 year Alternatively , compete ½ Ironman last year , least one standard distance triathlon ( 1.5 km swim , 40 km cycle , 10 km run ) within last 12 month : ≤2 h 13 min , men age 1840 year ≤2 h 18 min men age 4050 year ≤2 h 23 min men age 5060 year Available compete ½ Ironman event complete study requirement Experienced use carbohydrate supplementation , gel , bar , drink training/racing , specifically rate ≥6090g/h ) Experience specific formulation may include multiple single transportable carbohydrate , thus full assessment would make prior recruitment ensure balance randomization account association primary outcome Obtained ( legal representative 's ) inform consent . Failure meet health requirement define Health Questionnaire Prior know fructose intolerance Wheat intolerance preclude food packagingrelated allergy An exist injury affect ability race best ability A chronic injury may affect ability complete race Unable carry performance assessment questionnaires correctly Unable tolerate treatment familiarization session Taking medication think interfere study outcome Currently participate participate another clinical study last four week prior begin study
